content: This new movie, made by the same director of "Point Break" seems to depict the story of a unit of EOD/bomb squad GIs in Iraq, from what one can see on the trailers. The trailers for "The Hurt Locker" can easily be found on youtube. It's set for release on August 2009.
reply: This new movie, made by the same director of "Point Break" seems to depict the story of a unit of EOD/bomb squad GIs in Iraq, from what one can see on the trailers. The trailers for "The Hurt Locker" can easily be found on youtube. It's set for release on August 2009.
title: "The Hurt Locker" new feature film on EOD/bomb squad GIs in Iraq
